includes: All presentations and networking events; includes access to workshops where applicable (some workshops may be invitation-only or require separate registration).
notes: Price shown on the official EAC booking portal. Confirm the latest price and availability before purchase.

includes: Access to coffee breaks and social events only (per the booking portal).
notes: Published as a separate ticket type on the booking portal; confirm the latest price and what is included before purchase.

includes: 3m exhibition space with TV screen and blue panels; must be purchased with a Full Delegate ticket.
notes: Availability may be limited; check the portal for current status.

includes: Non-delegate access to specific workshops (e.g., FDD or Formation) as listed on the booking portal.
notes: Each workshop may have eligibility and priority rules; follow the registration guidance on the portal.
